title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content: eating Lorroakan will result in Rolan taking over the Sorcerous Sundries. The achievement will be awarded after beating the game, and not when the final requirement is met. Notes: Finding Mol might not be a requiement (alltho killing Raphael and/or taking Mol's contract might be relevant, it remains to be tested). All's Well That Ends Well Finish the game. Unmissable Storyline achievement. Absolute Power Corrupts Reign with terror: take control of the Netherbrain and bend the world to your will.
